titleStmt.title: A warning for house-keepers, or, A discovery of all sorts of thieves and robbers which go under these titles viz. the gilter, the mill, the glasier, budg and snudg. file-lifter, tongue-padder, the private theif. With directions how to prevent them. Also an exact discription of every one of their practices. Writen by one who was a prisoner in Newgate. With allowance.

notesStmt.note: The words"the gilter, .. theif" are gathered in a left brace in the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
